divs: sighting detailsit was in the evening after dinner, i was in my room doing bills and making phone calls. my wife had left the house to pick our son up from ccd class. this is over at 7:30 pm and just about 8 minutes away from our home. when she arrived back home @ approximately 7:40 pm she came running up the stairs to tell me that she had just seen the freakiest thing. so i asked her what she saw. my wife told me she saw this black triangle shaped craft just sitting above the gas station at the corner of huntingdon pike and rockledge avenue on her way to pick up our son. the gas station is just a 1\4 mile up rockledge avenue from our house. she very excited by the way. when she was telling her story. she estimated it to be just 300 or 400 feet above the station. the craft was totally still and totally silent. she also pointed out that the thing was so low that she witnessed great detail of the craft. she was observing this event while approaching the intersection through the front windshield and then while sitting at the red light she actually put her head out the window to listen for any noise. eventually the signal changed and she had to get our son. by the way there was regular vehicle traffic around no one else seemed to notice this craft just sitting there. on the way back from getting our son she started looking for the craft again while driving and encouraging him to do the same. the craft was no longer over the gas station on the return trip. but when she made the left turn onto rockledge ave. she spotted it again moving towards our very house and then it moved off extremely fast and disappeared. well, you could just imagine my disbelief in this story and amazement. so i went out side to take a look for myself with the wife and two kids on my tail. it was night time but a well moonlit night. we went into the back yard and investigated the sky. in just a few moments my wife yells out there it is. sure enough over the trees towards the east was this big black triangle just sitting there still and quite. it was approximately a 1\4 mile away. it had a light at each point of the triangle and a red light in the center of the craft. after a couple of minutes it started moving very slowly to my right which would be south. it moved towards the south for some distance still in sight then it moved back to my left for some equal distance then it stopped again. i yelled to my son to go and get my binoculars. he did and comes back a few minutes later with a pair of his binoculars. well they are toy binoculars; i can't see any thing out of them. so i yell out these aren't my binocs and tell my wife to keep and eye on the triangle while i go find my 10x50 binochs. so by the time that i retrieved my binocs and get back to view the craft 5 minutes have had to pass. but low and behold the triangle is still right there still just sitting there totally still. so now i view this thing through the binoculars. it���s big and black with a white light at one point , a red light at another point, and a green light at the third point. it also had a very peculiar red light that seemed to be spinning at the center of the craft. at one point the light seemed to shine into my binoculars and flash across my eyes kind of like a flash from a camera. my wife said that she saw a beam of light come out from the craft. we observed this thing for approximately 15 more minutes it was sweeping left to right and right to left all the while heading east. moving very slow and steadily. by the way there is a small farm due east of our house that is the location that the craft seemed to be hovering over. the farm is called fox chase farm in philadelphia. it is a two minute drive by car from my home. i estimated this thing from the distance; i observed to be 300 feet long by 200 feet at the widest part of the triangle. hovering at 200 or 300 feet over the trees. but that is really anybody���s guess. i know one thing that it was real and i want to see it again. however i was watching your program on the discovery channel last night. you featured the sightings that have been reported in bucks county pa. i was particularly interested in the description of the ufo made by the gentlemen last night. he described a kind of craft that was kind of like a pie. that he could see through the gaps in the craft when the heat lighting was illuminating the craft. well i thought this is where the triangle came from. it looks like the black triangle could separate from that pie ship. it���s just an idea that popped into my head and it is really why i decided to tell you my story. since bucks county is the next county over from montgomery county. who knows maybe our story may help you figure this thing out.
Summary: Black triangle over neighborhood seen hovering,moving slow , and darting fast.
